definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
Examination Yuan, the qualification and appointment board under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan/exam board

pinyin: Shang1 wu4 Han4 yu3 Kao3 shi4

definition: Advanced Subjects Test, university entrance exam that assesses candidates’ higher level knowledge of specific subjects and their readiness to study in their selected academic discipline (Tw)/abbr. to 指考[Zhi3 kao3]
pinyin: Da4 xue2 Ru4 xue2 Zhi3 ding4 Ke1 mu4 Kao3 shi4
containing_words.word: 大學入學指定科目考試

definition: NCEE, National College Entrance Examination (college entrance exam in PRC)/usually abbr. to 高考[gao1 kao3]
pinyin: Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4
containing_words.word: 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試

definition: agrégation (exam for teaching diploma in French universities)

pinyin: Han4 yu3 Shui3 ping2 Kao3 shi4

definition: to screen/to grade by examination/screening/placement test
see 考試卷|考试卷[kao3 shi4 juan4]

sentences.english: The way one studies for tests is very important.
Exam, only write the pen of the broken broken voice and more or less beating.
sentences.chinese: 考試中，只有寫字筆的碎碎聲音和或多或少的心跳聲。

sentences.english: Nana pulled an all-nighter to study for her math exam.
sentences.chinese: 爲了應付數學考試，娜娜學了一個通宵。

sentences.english: Testing plays an important part in university's teaching and quality administration.
sentences.chinese: 考試是高等學校教學管理和質量管理的重要內容之一。

sentences.english: Could you describe one of your hardest exams?
sentences.chinese: 你能說說你一門最難的考試嗎？

sentences.english: I will take an end-of-term exam this Friday.
sentences.chinese: 這週五我要進行期末考試。

sentences.english: Here are some sample questions for last year's exam.
sentences.chinese: 這是去年考試中的一些樣題。

sentences.english: I burnt some joss papers and pray to the examination god.
sentences.chinese: 我燒了一些金紙，祈求上帝的考試。

sentences.english: I was level with my friend in the examination；we got the same number of marks.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的朋友考試成績一樣，我們所得分數相同。

sentences.english: Let's say that your test at school is happening the next day.
sentences.chinese: 假設第二天學校就要考試了。

sentences.english: All you have to do is get an A on the next test, and then you can pass Math!
sentences.chinese: 你只要在下一次考試拿A就行啦，你的數學就能過了。

sentences.english: English is my last one examination to get a good feeling.
sentences.chinese: 英語是我的最後一門考試，感覺考得還不錯。

sentences.english: He failed in the end-of-term exam.
MHK is the shortened form of the Chinese Proficiency Test for Minorities in China.
sentences.chinese: MHK是中國少數民族漢語水平等級考試的簡稱。

sentences.english: I had done a better job in the final examination!
sentences.chinese: 我多麼希望在期末考試時考出好成績。

sentences.english: Participated in the Collge English Test Band Four and Six, and achieved excellent scores.
sentences.chinese: 參加英語四六級考試，並取得優異成績。

definition: to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
variant of 復習|复习[fu4 xi2]
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
